lyrics: 望天，望天看月

For me

name: Beautiful Life
lyrics: You see, birds in the sky
Flying so high
Got everywhere to go
You find, faces with smile
Only delight
No sorrow
You hear, calls from your friends
Songs from your heart
You never alone
You draw, picture you want
Dream in your life
No sorrow
When everyone passed by
You ain't left behind
I always stand by
When the sunset arrives
Your world is still bright
By the heart of light
Cos we always strive
In the beautiful life
In the beautiful life

name: 這佔有，是誰的擁抱
lyrics: 未知的欲望 消散 這佔有  是誰的擁抱
誰能告訴我 是誰 用愛情 連成了大海
燈火  零星地閃爍   盡情的沉醉啊
愛情 就這樣凋謝  鍾情於黑夜 啊
失敗的人啊 佔有 的愛情 已經不見
含情脈脈的張望 誰知道 她在哪裡呢
飄散 無盡的光啊 欲望的色差 啊
抽打 佝僂的枝椏 唾沫都吐幹 啊
未知的欲望 消散 這是愛 流成大海

name: 漆黑的海上
lyrics: 漆黑的夜裡 你是那片雲
潮漲潮汐 遊鷗之語 柔進我的夢裡
海是夜的明鏡  岸邊的人魚
月影一般 輕輕掠過 柔進我的夢裡
微弱的燈火 鑽進你頭髮裡 淒婉白紗
迷茫的愛 我留在孤獨裡
我渴望走向你  海水的哀曲裡
我看著你 你不看我 注視著遠方

name: Away
lyrics: Running away before the sky turns too dark
Running away when you don't see
Running away before the wind got too cold
Running away and just don't say
You didn't try to show that you care
You wish me falling like shooting stars
Even I'm only dust in your sky
And you don't even want to see
Flowing away like flower you send to me
Flowing away at summer's end
Flowing away like fires burned down  in the light
Just like all of my love for you.
when you look at me I know I see light
But you turned back and just let me cry
Maybe it's just too brave to say loud
And you don't even care if I stay.
